snippet: Greta Gerwig takes her profession seriously, but her naturalness on screen can make it seem as though she is merely playing a version of herself, over and over again.
lead_paragraph: SHE'S not obsessing over them or anything, but there are some things that the actress Greta Gerwig would like to clear up, a few misconceptions that peeve her. One: She is not a klutz. ''I think I have the reputation for being kind of clumsy, but I've always been athletically very gifted, actually,'' she said. She studied ballet as a child, then switched to fencing -- the footwork is not all that different -- and excelled enough to win her share of trophies as a teenager. She still bouts sometimes, when she's home in New York.

headline.main: Greta Gerwig Is Smart. Just Ask Her.
